name: Police Offroad Escape Chase
description:
Police Offroad Escape is an adventure game in which your duty is to escape from police chase. Hold on, You are wanted, involved in robbery and police is searching for you desperately. The story is based on a real time thief, who was involved in several criminal activities. The cops are now active in the investigation of crime.


Criminals are escaping from prison robbery in fast traffic roads. Your duty is to run for your survival as far as you can. Take your heavy cars and drive the bikes through difficult roads and spread the chaos in city. The cops are always there to chase you but your duty is little crazy. Do some driving stunt and don’t allow the police to catch you.



Features:
- Escape from the police investigation
- Run in a car
- Auto acceleration for real time escape
- Tap left half of screen to move left and right half to move right.
- Real time city environment.
